Question: First Name: Taxpayer's first name.
Last Name: Taxpayer's last name.
Adjusted Gross Income (AGI): Total income minus adjustments.
Total Income: Sum of all income sources.
Taxable Income: Income after deductions.
Filing Status: Single, Married Filing Jointly, etc.
Filing Status: Single, Married Filing Jointly, etc.
Tax Liability: Total tax owed before payments/credits.
Description: The total amount of taxes assessed in the current tax year.

Refund Amount: If applicable.
Tax Owed: Balance due after credits/payments.
Income Sources: Wages, interest, dividends, capital gains, business income, retirement distributions, etc.
Itemized Deductions vs. Standard Deduction: Amounts and types.
Itemized Deductions vs. Standard Deduction: Amounts and types.
Description: Amount of Standard or Itemized Deductions

Question: Dependents Claimed: Number and details.
Tax Credits Claimed: e.g., Child Tax Credit, Education Credits.
